name: Shinku no samurai
description:
I made this some time 2019 and haven't returned to carry on making it, I might continue at some point but I'm not sure what the overall objective will be yet.

You play as a pixel samurai and can run around a 2d platformer-like stage. I have made idle, running and jump anims. I found a 4-colour palette from lospec and made my sprites on asperite. The game itself is made on Unity.
